Message Contents: I'm having trouble dealing with a colleague who doesn't listen to instructions properly. Any advice?
Try using open-ended questions to engage them. If they don't respond well, summarise instructions back to confirm understanding.
A customer keeps interrupting when I try to explain something. How do I handle this?
Acknowledge their concern first, then politely redirect the conversation by saying, 'I hear you, but let me finish this explanation for you.'
